title: Sunrise Vinyasa Flow
description: Start your day with an energizing Vinyasa flow sequence synchronized with breath. Suitable for all levels looking to build heat and flexibility.
short_desc: Energize your morning with flowing sequences

title: Gentle Hatha Yoga
description: A slower-paced class focusing on foundational postures, alignment, and mindful breathing. Perfect for beginners or those seeking a relaxing practice.

title: Power Yoga Challenge
description: A dynamic and vigorous practice designed to build strength, stamina, and focus. Expect challenging sequences and optional inversions.
short_desc: Challenge your limits and build strength

title: Restorative Yoga & Meditation
description: Unwind and release tension with long-held, supported poses using props. Includes guided meditation for deep relaxation and stress relief.
short_desc: Deep relaxation for body and mind

title: Ashtanga Primary Series Intro
description: Learn the fundamentals of the Ashtanga Primary Series in this introductory class, focusing on the set sequence and Ujjayi breath.

title: Yin Yoga Deep Stretch
description: Target deep connective tissues with passively held floor poses. A meditative practice promoting flexibility and joint health.
short_desc: Release tension with deep, passive stretches

title: Prenatal Yoga
description: A supportive class designed for expectant mothers, focusing on safe movements, breathwork, and relaxation techniques for pregnancy.

title: Lunchtime Express Flow
description: Recharge midday with a quick, efficient 45-minute Vinyasa flow to reset your body and mind. Open to all levels.

title: Candlelight Yoga
description: A gentle evening practice by candlelight to wind down and prepare for restful sleep. Includes slow flows and restorative poses.

title: Yoga for Flexibility
description: Focus on increasing range of motion and opening tight areas of the body. Perfect for athletes or anyone looking to improve flexibility.

title: Mindful Movement & Meditation
description: Combine gentle, intentional movement with extended meditation periods. Develop mindfulness both on and off the mat.

title: Advanced Inversions Workshop
description: For experienced practitioners wanting to refine their inversion practice. Learn techniques for headstands, handstands, and arm balances.
